document_data.name: Opossum
document_data.mainbody: '''Opossums''', also known as '''possums''', were small [[marsupial]]s that lived in forests.
document_data.Description: The fur of an opossum was coarse and oily.
document_data.Abilities: Opossums had keen senses of smell and hearing.
document_data.History: In the ancient [[Netherese enclave]] of [[Eileanar]], magically altered opossums known as [[sniffer]]s acted as the noses of [[spider golem]]s.

Ecology.Habitats: Opossums could be found in [[Cormanthor]], [[Thar]], the [[Tannath Gap]], [[Semberholme]], and the [[Mere of Dead Men]].{{Cite dungeon/71/Dreadful Vestiges|49}} Intelligent opossums capable of speech were found on the [[Steaming Isles]], where they acted as chamberlains and household servants to the animal [[pasha]]s. Due to the influence of [[Citadel Umbra]], opossums of the [[Winterglen]] operated as spies for [[Unseelie Court|Unseelie]] creatures in the forest.{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|7}}
Ecology.Relationships:
Opossums were sometimes taken as [[familiar]]s by [[wizard]]s,{{Cite dragon/84/A cast of strange familiars|16}} and [[rangers]] that dwelt in urban environments took them as [[animal companion]]s.

Some were known to act as [[favored animal|servants]] of the [[deity]] [[Thoth]].

document_data.Notable Opossums: * [[Pocket]], the pet of the young mage's apprentice [[Sil]].
document_data.Trivia: * In the [[church of Baervan Wildwanderer|church of]] [[Baervan Wildwanderer]], "Opossum" was one of the titles for confirmed [[priest]]s, ranking directly above "[[Squirrel]]" and below "[[Hedgehog]]".
